sentence.Network_en: The President could continue to bash Democrats as being soft on crime.
sentence.Network_cn: 总统可能会继续抨击民主党人对待犯罪活动心慈手软。

sentence.Network_en: Their ambitions are to bash out good grub with minimal fuss.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们的目标就是尽可能省劲地大量供应可口饭菜。

sentence.Network_en: He's prepared to have a bash at discussing it intelligently.
sentence.Network_cn: 他已经准备好尽量巧妙地讨论这个问题。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent. (as a verb): imitative, perhaps a blend of bang and smash, dash, etc. Sense 2 is a 20th cent. usage

encyclopedia.content: 简介 Bash(GNU Bourne-Again Shell)是许多Linux平台的内定Shell，事实上，还有许多传统UNIX上用的Shell，像tcsh、csh、ash、bsh、ksh等等，Shell Script大致都类同，当您学会一种Shell以后，其它的Shell会很快就上手，大多数的时候，一个Shell Script通常可以在很多种Shell上使用Linux之父Linus对BASH的描述 我下载了一个叫Borne Shell的外壳程序。它是UNIX的初始外壳程序之一，可以从互联网上免费下载，名字来源于一个难听的双关

entry.def: A bash is a party or celebration, especially a large one held by an official organization or attended by famous people.

example.ex: He threw one of the biggest showbiz bashes of the year as a 36th birthday party for Jerry Hall.
example.tran: 为了庆祝杰里·霍尔的36岁生日，他举办了当年演艺圈最盛大的庆祝宴会。

entry.def: If someone bashes you, they attack you by hitting or punching you hard.

example.ex: If someone tried to bash my best mate they would have to bash me as well...
example.tran: 如果谁想揍我最好的朋友，那我就跟他拼了。

example.ex: I bashed him on the head and dumped him in the cold, cold water...
example.tran: 我猛击他的头部，然后把他扔进了冰冷冰冷的水里。

entry.def: If you bash something, you hit it hard in a rough or careless way.

example.ex: Too many golfers try to bash the ball out of sand. That spells disaster...
example.tran: 太多高尔夫球手都想把球从沙子里敲出来，结果酿成了一场灾难。

example.ex: A stand-in drummer bashes on a single snare and a pair of cymbals.
example.tran: 一名临时顶替的鼓手使劲敲着一根响弦和一对铙钹。

entry.def: If you get a bash on a part of your body, someone or something hits you hard, or you bump into something.
To bash someone means to criticize them severely, usually in a public way.

example.ex: The President could continue to bash Democrats as being soft on crime.
example.tran: 总统可能会继续抨击民主党人对待犯罪活动心慈手软。

entry.def: If you have a bash at something, you try to do it.

example.ex: He's prepared to have a bash at discussing it intelligently.
example.tran: 他已经准备好尽量巧妙地讨论这个问题。

sentences.sentence: "he took a bash right in his face"
"he got a bang on the head"
